channel.title: Geting a site compatible with IE (yuck) as well as FF
channel.description:
hey just a quick question if i take my site to XHTML 1.0 strict would that do it or whould i have to use the css checker as well? and even if i do all that would it be compatible?
its just ive designed my site from nothing in FireFox and now its screwed up in IE so you know i gotta get it working.. also is there a quick way of doing it or do i have to just look at the error list then go find out what needs changing then go change it?
~thanks N00b1

item.title: Geting a site compatible with IE (yuck) as well as FF
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

use three stylesheets then, a general one, IE, and other browsers (could be done with either javascript or php)

Read full topic
item.source: Geting a site compatible with IE (yuck) as well as FF
